articles.title: Live updates from the Seisiún Irish music festival in Boston
articles.description:
Follow along for all of the best photos, videos, and stories from both days of the festival at Suffolk Downs.

The post Live updates from the Seisiún Irish music festival in Boston appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: The Seisiún Irish music festival took place at Suffolk Downs on September 6-7.
Local artists and musicians showcased their talents, enhancing Boston's cultural scene.
Residents enjoyed a vibrant celebration of Irish culture, fostering community engagement.
